scripts.dev: concurrently -k -n server,client -c auto "npm run dev:server" "npm run dev:client"
scripts.e2e:test: npm run e2e:check-docker && npm run e2e:docker:up && playwright test
scripts.e2e:test:headed: npm run e2e:check-docker && npm run e2e:docker:up && playwright test --headed
scripts.test:e2e: npm run e2e:check-docker && npm run e2e:docker:up && playwright test
scripts.test:e2e:headed: npm run e2e:check-docker && npm run e2e:docker:up && playwright test --headed
